comments.author: alessio.placitelli@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
It would be very useful, when debugging released products and for QA, to have glean print its version when initializing, as done by application-services.

We should probably print it [here](https://searchfox.org/glean/rev/848bd1b3fe16a31346d44326e7da24ff0245a78e/glean-core/src/lib.rs#186)
